intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product. The N2K product provides detailed land cover and land use (LC/LU) data for grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe, specifically for the reference years 2006, 2012, and 2018. It aims to support the monitoring and assessment of habitat conservation status by offering high-resolution satellite-based status and change maps, all classified according to a harmonised nomenclature.
keywords: Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services (MAES)
